storytelling_templates.formal_opening: 很久很久以前 (Long long ago...)

naming.locked_behavior: Offering tea with two hands; physical respect shown by a slight head tilt.

protagonist.base: Constant: Chinese features, large expressive eyes, same face shape.
protagonist.boy: Outfit: Bright red track-style school jacket with white stripes, denim trousers, yellow sneakers. Hair: thick black hair with a neat bowl-cut.
protagonist.girl: Outfit: Bright red track-style school skirt unit with white stripes, yellow sneakers. Hair: black hair with two small buns.

characters.support: Elderly Chinese man. HAIR: Thinning grey hair. OUTFIT: Grey Mao-style jacket or simple collared cotton shirt. PROP: A small birdcage or a thermos of hot tea.

architecture.style: Mix of modern high-rises and traditional gray-tiled Siheyuan courtyards.

visual_identity.environment: Golden afternoon sun, weeping willow trees, stone bridges, terracotta planters with lotuses.

clothing.men: Simple button-up shirts or Tang-style jackets.
clothing.women: Modern floral dresses or Qipao-inspired tops.
clothing.children: Colorful primary-colored tracksuits or puffer vests.

urban_settings.busy_road: Wide boulevards, electric bike lanes, green public buses, modern traffic signals with timers.
urban_settings.neighborhood: Busy fruit stalls, elders playing Mahjong on folding tables, laundry hanging on bamboo poles.

avoid: Lack of modern technology in urban scenes
negatives.emotion_guideline: Family-centric warmth, studious focus, respectful observation.

plot_anchors.crossing_in_progress: Composition: Boy and elder man WALKING ACROSS a wide boulevard. Electric scooters waiting in background.
plot_anchors.crossing_completed: Composition: Boy and elder man are SAFE on the sidewalk. Traffic is visible in the distance behind them.
plot_anchors.greeting: Composition: Boy tilting head slightly in respect, offering a thermos or tea cup with both hands to the elder man.
